**Message by the user**

**Original Code passed**

**Tokens generated**
Tokens can be collected with the `-t` flag
```
comrade test.cmr -t
```

**Syntax Tree generated**
Syntax Tree can be collected with the `-a` flag
```
comrade test.cmr -a
```

**C code generated**
Code code can be collected with the `-c` flag
```
comrade test.cmr -c
```
